title: New Game Mode idea: Blast from the Past
body:
i had a smashing new idea for a game mode for SummonersRift. Blast in the past would basically allow us to play the old SR maps and champs from a previous season, for example: Blast from the past season 2 would allow us to play on the S2 map as well as allowing us to use champions during their season 2 state such as Jax (90% dodge chance), Kassadin (RIP silence) and Yi(AP Yi) and the items and summoner spells would also be available. Post season 2 champions would also be allowed on the game mode as it would be interesting how over/underpowered they would be with S2 items.
Thoughts?

replies.body: This would take a helluva long time to make.

it would also take forever to switch between each map and to get back the old maps, the servers would be soooooo laggy!!! its a okay idea but lets be honest here, it would take to long and not many people would want that really bad looking season 2 map back, it would be a pretty quiet gamemode
To be honest, I wish I was around during season 1 - 2... League looked like such a peaceful game back then :c
Wat about the retro closed beta map? That wouldn't take much data to load from the servers. You could also have the original well unbalanced champs.
When something updates it removes it, essentially doing this will cause LoL's folder size to triple.
